An urdefhan cult's best tormentors can advance to become truly formidable daemon summoners. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 27 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 [Urdefhan High Tormentor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=877) **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 82 **Perception** +22; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +22, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22 **Str** +5 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +1 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +3 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +16 **Will** +22 **HP** 195 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects (except necrotic decay), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Weaknesses** positive 10 **Necrotic Decay** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When an urdefhan dies, its invisible flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a 5-foot emanation around the body. This gas deals 10d6 negative damage to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (DC 29 basic Fortitude save). --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _warhammer_ +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d8+11 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d6+11 piercing plus wicked bite **Divine Innate Spells** DC 30, attack +22 - **1st** [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) (self only), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2) - **2nd** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) - **3rd** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×2), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) (×2) - **4th** [Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306) - **5th** [Banishment](/Spells.aspx?ID=19), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) (daemons only) **Divine Rituals** DC 30 - **1st** [Daemonic Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=25) **Stoke the Fervent** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The urdefhan lets out a battle cry, sending itself and its allies into a fanatical frenzy. Each ally that hears the call gains a +4 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and a +2 status bonus to saving throws, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able (even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air). This lasts for 2d4 rounds. **Wicked Bite** **Requirements** The urdefhan damaged a creature with a jaws Strike on its last action; **Effect** The urdefhan maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the site of the injury. The urdefhan chooses one of two options, each of which requires a DC 29 Fortitude save. If the jaws Strike was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.
  • **Drain Blood** The urdefhan drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and the urdefhan regains 5 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's drained 2 and the urdefhan regains 10 HP).
  • **Drain Vitality** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The urdefhan draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 hour on a failed save (or enfeebled 2 for 1 hour on a critical failure).
name: Urdefhan High Tormentor
